description:
Hit the trails in this soft and light tee.

  • Soft material is a lightweight blend of polyester, Tencel, and spandex
  • Wicking finish improves upon polyester’s already impressive wicking ability
  • Bluesign® approved anti odour control helps keep your tee fresher, longer
  • Stealthy on-seam zippered pocket on the upper left sleeve for keys and bit of cash
  • Relaxed fit leaves lots of room for you to move and air to flow
name: MEC Trail T-Shirt - Men's
